footer.about-us-body: We are a group of six students at Chalmers University of Technology. This website was made as a part of our bachelor's thesis to allow anyone to use our machine learning model.

about-us.about-us-body: We are a group of six students at Chalmers University of Technology. This website was made as a part of our bachelor's thesis to allow anyone to use our machine learning model.
about-us.about-our-model-body: Our model is a convolutional neural network that takes in a video of a person running and outputs a prediction of the person's running style. The model was trained on a dataset of 1000 videos of people running, and it has an accuracy of 90% on the test set.

terms-of-use.title: TERMS OF USE
terms-of-use.first-line: This model does not aim to give medical advice, consult with a doctor or other specialist before adjusting your running gait
terms-of-use.second-line: When analysing your data the data is locally saved and then deleted, you can pull back your data anytime by pressing quit
terms-of-use.third-line: The model has best results when only one person is in frame and when at least 5 running gaits are included
terms-of-use.fourth-line: By using the model I agree with these terms
